channel.title: 3 testers needed to test my LoadEncounter [PICTURES!]
channel.description:
So my loadEncounter has been finished :P (with a couple of tweaks, it should be good ^^)
I'm looking for 3 testers that would accompany me on this test of "power" behind this coding :P More specifically - I have coded a boss fight that uses the following: Load an entire encounter from a text file Easily written NPC Health percentage based Stable Supports party system (optional :P)
If this test succeeds, I am going to post a full tutorial for how others can add it to their server :D So they can have a piece of the awesome too ^^
To be the tester for tonight: Comment here that you want to see the epicness for yourself (either the Lich King encounter [80% similar to the WoW version] or just to see how the loadEncounter itself works). I'll then PM you the download for the client (the client contains the test-servers IP :)) oh btw... the client hasnt been my development focus... so its rather primitive ;)
got to be ready to: Wait a couple of minutes for other testers to show up Be quick on your feet ingame (the encounter is difficult!) Be supportive (help your teammates not die :P)
Pics!
